unnormalised: Preparations are in full swing for Isha Ambani's Diwali bash on Oct 27th, 2024! The who's who of Bollywood and the business world are expected to descend on Mumbai for what’s being billed as the event of the year. Word is, the party starts at 8:00 PM sharp, but knowing these folks, things might get rolling a bit later, around 9:00 PM or so!
normalised: Preparations are in full swing for Isha Ambani's Diwali bash on October twenty seventh, two thousand and twenty four! The who's who of Bollywood and the business world are expected to descend on Mumbai for what’s being billed as the event of the year. Word is, the party starts at eight P-M sharp, but knowing these folks, things might get rolling a bit later, around nine P-M or so!

unnormalised: Sources say the theme is 'Indian Heritage', and guests are requested to don traditional attire. Can’t wait to see what the stars will be wearing! The security around Ambani's residence, Antilia, will be tight on 27/10/24 from 6 PM onwards. Expect traffic snarls around Altamount Road that evening, so plan your travel accordingly, guys!
normalised: Sources say the theme is 'Indian Heritage', and guests are requested to don traditional attire. Can’t wait to see what the stars will be wearing! The security around Ambani's residence, Antilia, will be tight on twenty seventh October two thousand and twenty four from six P-M onwards. Expect traffic snarls around Altamount Road that evening, so plan your travel accordingly, guys!

unnormalised: Apparently, there’s also going to be a special performance by an international artist. Rumours are flying thick and fast, but no confirmations yet. Some say it's gonna be Taylor Swift, others are betting on BTS. We’ll just have to wait till 10 PM on the 27th to find out for sure!
normalised: Apparently, there’s also going to be a special performance by an international artist. Rumours are flying thick and fast, but no confirmations yet. Some say it's gonna be Taylor Swift, others are betting on B-T-S. We’ll just have to wait till ten P-M on the twenty seventh to find out for sure!

unnormalised: Stay tuned for more updates as we get closer to the big day! We'll be bringing you all the inside scoop, from guest lists to décor details. It's gonna be a Diwali to remember, folks! Check back on Nov 1st for pictures of the event.
normalised: Stay tuned for more updates as we get closer to the big day! We'll be bringing you all the inside scoop, from guest lists to décor details. It's gonna be a Diwali to remember, folks! Check back on November first for pictures of the event.
